imdb.title: Magical Girl Special Ops Asuka
imdb.plot: A former magical girl must return to duty when an invading alien army she had defeated years ago comes back for another assault.

episodes.title: The Magical Girl Comes Back
episodes.plot: It's been three years since the end of the Distonian War, where humanity fought against the Disas Beasts. War Hero Otori Asuka has quit her job as a magical girl and gone back to being a regular high school student.

episodes.title: Daily Life and Comrades in Arms
episodes.plot: Asuka transformed into a magical girl again and protected her friend from the terrorists. Now, she hears information about Kurumi, another member of the Magical Five. Kurumi continues to fight.

episodes.title: A More Terrible War
episodes.plot: Asuka and the others go to the pool to welcome Kurumi, the new transfer student. Asuka is enjoying her peaceful days, and her time as a magical girl seems like it ended many years ago.

episodes.title: Babel Brigade - Combat Begins
episodes.plot: Nozomi is kidnapped and tortured by Abigail and her allies. Asuka is worried when she hears that Nozomi's been kidnapped, but neither Public Safety nor M Squad can intervene.

episodes.title: A Very Realistic Way of Dealing with a Problem
episodes.plot: As Kurumi escapes with Nozomi, Asuka fights the two Russian mercenaries. M Squad arrives to join the fight, but they lack any magic of their own.

episodes.title: Wish Upon a Star
episodes.plot: Asuka is sent to aTanabatafestival, where she meets a mysterious stranger who is far more deadly than she appears to be.

episodes.title: Magical Girl Operations Development Unit
episodes.plot: The M Squad throws a welcoming party for Asuka, but shortly after she is sent on her first mission as an official member!

episodes.title: You'll Be a Wonderful Magical Girl
episodes.plot: Giess approaches Chisato, a young girl who lost her leg in a terrible car accident, and asks her if she wants to become a magical girl. Meanwhile, Asuka spends time training at the beach.

episodes.title: The Lid of Hell
episodes.plot: Asuka's vacation is cut short by a summon from General Tabira, which coincides with an attack on the Naha Garrison.

episodes.title: Each of Their Deadly Battles
episodes.plot: The pressure is on as the Disas attack continues on Naha Garrison, but repelling their assault quickly becomes a sisyphean task.

episodes.title: The Magical Girls and This Beautiful World
episodes.plot: Asuka and Geiss battle it out, while a significant detail regarding Chisato's past is revealed.

episodes.title: If This Battle Ever Ends
episodes.plot: Asuka and her friends are invited the M-Squad's maid cafe for a party, meanwhile Queen's final plans begin to take shape.
